name: Maze Maverick
description:
Step into the electrifying world of Maze Maverick. Think you've mastered mazes? Think again! Navigate unpredictable labyrinths, dodge crafty ghosts, and snatch up coins in this thrilling arcade extravaganza.

Game Modes Galore!


- Arcade Mode: Classic mazing with a Maverick twist! Grab strawberries to sneak through walls or chomp on cherries to teach those ghosts a lesson. But beware, some ghosts aren't just wandering – they're hunting!

- Ghost Mode: Who needs walls? Roam freely, gather coins, but remember: these ghosts have had their morning coffee. They're twice as fast and twice as sneaky!

- Darken Mode: No peeking! Navigate with no minimap and no sneaky shortcuts. Just you, the coins, and a couple of ghosts. Hope you've got a good memory!



- Skybox Mode: Show off your maze prowess on open terrains! But don't get too cocky, one misstep and you're history.

Features & Fun Stuff:


- 🎮 Dynamic Mazes: No repeats, no deja-vus. Every level offers a fresh, new challenge.

- 👻 Crafty Ghosts: Directly trying to catch you, each ghost adds its own pinch of chaos to the mix.

- 🕹️ Stunning Controls & Design: Smooth, responsive, and just downright fun.

- 🍒 Power-ups & More: Strawberries, cherries, and...wait, did that ghost just speed up?



Jump in, dodge, collect, and conquer! Are you maverick enough for Maze Maverick?
